meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>day</kanji> you hold in high <kanji>esteem</kanji> is an <vocabulary>auspicious day</vocabulary>. That's a fancy way of saying it's a really <vocabulary>lucky day</vocabulary>!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
